text:
IIRC Resources originally always instantiated its internal Collection; I would
therefore imagine this NPE crept in when I changed that.  I have put a guard
against the NPE, but since your Resources object had a nested <sort> you may
still not see what you want.  It could be a case of dumbness on my part wrt add
vs. addConfigured or something... I'll leave open.
